ing: 1 (46 fluid ounce) bottle tomato-vegetable juice cocktail
des: "This is my favorite stew in the world! I used a basic stew recipe and added some touches of my own to it.  My husband, our friend Jeff and I love it!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C).
In a large oven-proof pot, combine beef, potatoes, carrots, onion and vegetable juice.  Cover and bake in preheated oven 1 1/2 hours.
